original_text: Jerusalem is falling down! The towns of Judah are in trouble! The Lord hates the things that their people say and the things that they do. They have turned against the Lord and they insult him.
korean_text: 예루살렘이 멸망하였고 유다가 엎드러졌음은 그들의 언어와 행위가 여호와를 거역하여 그의 영광의 눈을 범하였음이라

sentences.original_text: The towns of Judah are in trouble!
The Lord hates the things that their people say
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 그 백성들이 하는 말들을 미워하신다

sentences.original_text: and the things that they do.
They have turned against the Lord
